phases.name: Research & Planning
phases.description: Comprehensive research and architectural planning before development

features.name: Research GitHub repos for patterns
features.description: Analyze awesome-llm-apps and scraping-apis-for-devs for reusable patterns

features.name: Decide on weather API provider
features.description: Research and select between OpenWeatherMap, WeatherAPI, Visual Crossing

features.name: Decide on currency API provider
features.description: Research and select between Fixer.io, ExchangeRate-API, Open Exchange Rates

features.name: Decide on flight API provider
features.description: Research and select between Amadeus, Skyscanner, Serpapi

features.name: Decide on visa data source
features.description: Research Sherpa API, IATA Travel Centre, official embassy scraping

features.name: Decide on map provider
features.description: Choose between Mapbox and Google Maps based on pricing and features

features.name: Decide on cloud infrastructure
features.description: Select backend hosting (AWS/Railway/Render), Redis hosting, deployment strategy

features.name: Design database schema
features.description: Create detailed Postgres schema for Users, Trips, AgentJobs, ReportSections, etc.

features.name: Design API contracts
features.description: Define REST API endpoints, request/response schemas, error formats

features.name: Create design system specification
features.description: Define colors, typography, component library, responsive breakpoints

features.name: Document user flows
features.description: Create flow diagrams for auth, trip creation, report generation, errors, data lifecycle

features.name: Research Firecrawl API
features.description: Understand Firecrawl pricing, capabilities, and integration patterns

features.name: Set up project structure
features.description: Create directory structure, init.ps1, documentation skeleton

features.name: Initialize git repository
features.description: Create git repo, .gitignore, initial commit

features.name: Create comprehensive documentation
features.description: Write comprehensive_plan.md, data_models.md, api_contracts.md, design_system.md, services_config.md

phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Set up core infrastructure, authentication, and database

features.name: Set up Supabase project
features.description: Create Supabase project, configure settings, get API keys

features.name: Configure Supabase Auth
features.description: Enable email/password and Google OAuth authentication

features.name: Create database tables
features.description: Create Users, Trips, AgentJobs, ReportSections, SourceReferences, DeletionSchedule tables

features.name: Implement Row-Level Security
features.description: Configure RLS policies for user data isolation

features.name: Set up Next.js frontend project
features.description: Initialize Next.js with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui

features.name: Set up FastAPI backend project
features.description: Initialize FastAPI with Python, create basic structure

features.name: Configure Redis instance
features.description: Set up Redis for caching and Celery backend

features.name: Set up Celery workers
features.description: Configure Celery for async task processing

features.name: Create Docker Compose for local dev
features.description: Set up docker-compose.yml for Redis and local services

features.name: Implement basic auth flow backend
features.description: Create Supabase auth integration in FastAPI

features.name: Create user registration/login UI
features.description: Build auth pages in Next.js with Supabase client

features.name: Set up CI/CD pipeline basics
features.description: Create GitHub Actions workflows for testing and linting

phases.name: Orchestrator Agent
phases.description: Build the central orchestrator that coordinates all other agents

features.name: Design orchestrator architecture
features.description: Define orchestrator's responsibilities, agent graph, execution order

features.name: Implement agent base class
features.description: Create BaseAgent with common methods for all agents

features.name: Create orchestrator agent
features.description: Implement OrchestratorAgent with dependency management

features.name: Implement agent state management
features.description: Track agent execution status, failures, retries

features.name: Create job queue system
features.description: Implement Celery tasks for agent execution

features.name: Implement progress tracking
features.description: Real-time progress updates for frontend

features.name: Build error handling framework
features.description: Implement retry logic, fallbacks, circuit breakers

features.name: Write orchestrator tests
features.description: Unit and integration tests for orchestrator

phases.name: Visa & Entry Agent
phases.description: Build the visa requirement determination agent (CRITICAL)

features.name: Implement Visa Agent core logic
features.description: Create VisaAgent class with requirement determination

features.name: Integrate visa data API
features.description: Connect to Sherpa API or IATA Travel Centre

features.name: Implement visa classification
features.description: Determine visa type (visa-free, eVisa, visa on arrival, visa required)

features.name: Add source attribution
features.description: Link to official government/embassy sources only

features.name: Implement confidence scoring
features.description: Calculate and output confidence score (0-100)

features.name: Add disclaimer generation
features.description: Generate explicit disclaimers for visa information

features.name: Write Visa Agent unit tests
features.description: Test visa determination logic with mock data

features.name: Write Visa Agent integration tests
features.description: Test with real API (rate-limited)

phases.name: Country Intelligence Agent
phases.description: Build the country information and intelligence agent

features.name: Implement Country Agent core logic
features.description: Create CountryAgent class

features.name: Integrate country data API
features.description: Use REST Countries API or similar for basic data

features.name: Implement flag and basic info retrieval
features.description: Get country flag, population, political system

features.name: Add religion and demographics data
features.description: Retrieve religious demographics

features.name: Implement safety intelligence
features.description: Get safety ratings and stability notes

features.name: Add news scraping
features.description: Use Firecrawl to get latest country news

features.name: Write Country Agent tests
features.description: Unit and integration tests

features.name: Implement Weather Agent core logic
features.description: Create WeatherAgent class

features.name: Integrate weather API
features.description: Connect to Visual Crossing or selected weather API

features.name: Implement forecast retrieval
features.description: Get 15-day forecast for trip dates

features.name: Add historical averages

features.name: Implement climate warnings
features.description: Detect and flag extreme weather conditions

features.name: Write Weather Agent tests

features.description: Calculate budget utilization and overspend risk

features.name: Write Currency Agent tests

features.name: Implement Food Agent core logic

features.name: Scrape national dishes and drinks

features.name: Integrate restaurant recommendations

phases.name: Itinerary Agent

features.name: Implement day-by-day scheduling

features.name: Add weather-aware scheduling

features.description: Order cities optimally

features.name: Add budget alignment
features.description: Ensure itinerary fits within budget

features.description: Adjust itinerary density based on user preference

features.name: Make itinerary editable
features.description: Allow users to modify itinerary blocks

features.name: Implement Flight Agent core logic
features.description: Create FlightAgent class

features.name: Add booking links

phases.name: Trip Creation & Input Validation

features.name: Design trip creation form UI
features.description: Create multi-step or single-page form

features.name: Implement input validation
features.description: Validate all required fields

features.description: Ensure dates are future dates

features.description: Ensure budget is numeric and positive

features.name: Create trip submission API
features.description: Backend endpoint to create trip and queue agents

features.name: Write trip creation tests

phases.name: Report Generation & Display
phases.description: Build the interactive report UI and PDF export

features.name: Design report data structure
features.description: Define JSON schema for aggregated report

features.name: Implement report aggregator
features.description: Combine all agent outputs into cohesive report

features.name: Create interactive web report UI
features.description: Build report display with shadcn/ui components

features.name: Build section navigation
features.description: Create nav for jumping between report sections

features.name: Implement expandable cards
features.description: Make sections expandable/collapsible

features.name: Add map embeds
features.description: Embed Mapbox maps for locations

features.name: Implement tooltips for warnings
features.description: Add hover tooltips for critical info

features.name: Create PDF export functionality
features.description: Server-side HTML to PDF rendering

features.name: Style report for print
features.description: Optimize PDF styling

features.name: Implement partial results rendering
features.description: Show results as agents complete

phases.name: Data Lifecycle Management
phases.description: Implement auto-deletion and data retention policies

features.name: Implement auto-deletion scheduler
features.description: Create Celery task to schedule trip deletion

features.description: Email users before trip data deletion

features.description: Allow users to delete trips early

features.name: Add data retention policy UI
features.description: Show users when their data will be deleted

features.name: Implement cleanup jobs
features.description: System-enforced cleanup cron jobs

features.name: Create audit logs
features.description: Log all data deletion events

phases.name: Polish & Production
phases.description: Final polish, production deployment, and monitoring

features.name: Performance optimization
features.description: Optimize frontend and backend performance

features.name: Security audit
features.description: Conduct security review and penetration testing

features.name: GDPR compliance verification
features.description: Ensure all GDPR requirements are met

features.name: Implement rate limiting
features.description: Add rate limiting to prevent abuse

features.name: Set up monitoring and alerting
features.description: Configure error tracking and uptime monitoring

features.name: Production deployment
features.description: Deploy to production environment

features.name: Documentation finalization
features.description: Complete all user and developer documentation

features.name: User acceptance testing
features.description: Conduct UAT with real users

notes: Phase 0 is research and planning - completed before coding begins
Each feature must pass tests before marking 'passes': true
Critical features block progress to next phase
Agent phases (3-11) can potentially be parallelized after Phase 2
All features require code review before completion
